basisSet.dc:title: cc-pwCVQZ
basisSet.dct:abstract: QZ3P Quadruple Zeta + Polarization + Tight Core
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Polarized Weighted CV Quadruple Zeta (cc-pwCVQZ) Basis ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References B - Ne: (15s,9p,5d,3f,1g) -> [8s,7p,5d,3f,1g] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 90, 1007 (1989). Al - Ar: (19s,14p,6d,4f,2g) -> [9s,8p,6d,4f,2g] K.A. Peterson and T.H. Dunning, Jr., J. Chem. Phys. 117, 10548 (2002). Br : (24s,19p,15d,5f,3g,1h) -> [10s,9p,7d,5f,3g,1h] K.A. Peterson (to be published) Note: these are preliminary exponents.
The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation.
